Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Percentage of customers who successfully complete the entire journey from initial contact to post-purchase follow-up.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (Number of Customers Completing the Journey / Total Number of Customers Targeted) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Accuracy of mapping the customer journey, based on how well the map reflects actual customer experiences and touchpoints.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (Number of Accurate Journey Maps / Total Number of Journey Maps) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.KPIS: Customer satisfaction at key journey touchpoints.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Satisfaction levels of customers at specific stages or touchpoints in their journey, measured through surveys or feedback.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score at Key Touchpoints in the Customer Journey

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.KPIS: Customer retention rate post journey mapping improvements.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Percentage of customers retained after implementing improvements based on customer journey mapping.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (Number of Customers Retained / Total Number of Customers After Improvements) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.KPIS: Conversion rate from one journey stage to another.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Percentage of customers who move from one stage of the customer journey to the next, such as from interest to purchase.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (Number of Conversions from One Stage to Another / Total Number of Customers at Previous Stage) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to map out customer journeys, including research, analysis, and documentation expenses.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Total Cost of Customer Journey Mapping / Total Number of Mapped Customer Journeys

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: How often customer journey maps are reviewed and updated to reflect changes in customer behavior or business processes.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Total Number of Journey Map Updates / Total Time Period

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.KPIS: Impact on customer lifetime value (CLV) from journey mapping.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Measure of how improvements from customer journey mapping affect the long-term value a customer brings to the company.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (CLV After Journey Mapping - CLV Before Journey Mapping) / CLV Before Journey Mapping * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Percentage of feedback requests that receive a response from the company, indicating engagement with customer or stakeholder input.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (Number of Feedback Responses / Total Number of Feedback Requests) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.KPIS: Number of actionable insights from feedback.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Total count of insights gained from feedback that can be used to make informed decisions or improvements.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Total Number of Actionable Insights Derived from Feedback

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Measure of how satisfied customers or stakeholders are with the way their feedback is handled, usually assessed through surveys.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Users Providing Feedback

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Average time taken to resolve feedback issues or concerns from the time they are received to the time they are addressed.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Average Time from Feedback Submission to Resolution

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Score assessing the overall sentiment of feedback (positive, negative, neutral) based on analysis of feedback comments and responses.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Average Sentiment Score from Feedback Sentiment Analysis

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Extent to which feedback is incorporated into business decision-making processes, evaluated by the percentage of decisions influenced by feedback.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (Number of Feedback Points Integrated / Total Number of Feedback Points Collected) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Effectiveness of various feedback channels, measured by metrics such as user engagement, response rate, and quality of feedback received.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Average Effectiveness Score of Feedback Channels

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Average cost incurred to manage and address each piece of feedback, including collection, analysis, and resolution expenses.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Total Cost of Managing Feedback / Total Number of Feedback Items Managed

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Rate at which improvements are made to the user experience, based on metrics like feature updates, usability enhancements, and user satisfaction improvements.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (Number of UX Improvements Achieved / Total Number of UX Improvement Opportunities) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Percentage of usability tests that meet predefined success criteria, such as user satisfaction, ease of use, and task completion.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (Number of Successful Usability Tests / Total Number of Usability Tests) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Satisfaction level of customers with the design and functionality of the user interface, measured through surveys or feedback.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Customers Regarding the User Interface

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Average time invested in making improvements to the user experience and user interface, including design, testing, and implementation phases.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Total Time Spent on UX/UI Improvements

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.KPIS: Conversion rate improvement from experience design changes.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Percentage increase in conversion rates resulting from changes made to the experience design.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (Conversion Rate After Changes - Conversion Rate Before Changes) / Conversion Rate Before Changes * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Rate at which new and innovative experience designs are developed and implemented, measured by the number of new concepts or solutions introduced.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (Number of New Experience Designs Introduced / Total Number of Design Opportunities) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Average cost of designing and implementing experience improvements per user, including design, testing, and deployment expenses.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Total Cost of Experience Design / Total Number of Users

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.KPIS: Stakeholder perception of experience design effectiveness.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: How stakeholders perceive the effectiveness of experience design efforts, based on feedback and assessments.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Average Perception Score from Stakeholders Regarding Experience Design Effectiveness

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Overall satisfaction level of users with the user experience, measured through surveys or feedback on the usability and effectiveness of the UX.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Average Satisfaction Score from Users Regarding UX Experience

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.KPIS: Task completion rate in user interface (UI).
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Percentage of tasks completed successfully by users through the user interface, indicating the effectiveness of UI design.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (Number of Completed Tasks / Total Number of Tasks Assigned) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Rate of errors made by users while interacting with the user interface, used to gauge the effectiveness of design and usability.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (Number of User Errors / Total Number of User Interactions) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.KPIS: User engagement metrics (time spent, pages visited).
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Metrics measuring user engagement with the product or service, including time spent on the platform and number of pages visited.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Average Time Spent per User and Average Number of Pages Visited per User

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Comparison of UX/UI performance against industry standards or best practices, measured through metrics like user satisfaction and usability scores.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Comparison of UX/UI Performance Metrics Against Industry Standards

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Degree to which UX/UI designs comply with accessibility standards and regulations, such as ADA or WCAG guidelines.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (Number of Accessibility Standards Met / Total Number of Accessibility Standards) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Percentage of UX/UI improvement projects that achieve their goals and meet success criteria, such as increased user satisfaction or improved performance.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: (Number of Successful UX/UI Improvement Projects / Total Number of UX/UI Improvement Projects) * 100

Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.EXPLANATION: Average cost of implementing improvements to UX/UI, including design, development, and testing expenses.
Sales and Marketing+Customer Experience.FORMULA: Total Cost of UX/UI Improvements / Total Number of UX/UI Improvements
